attributes.action: Theresa May to remain Prime Minister until the next general election.
attributes.additional_details: Parliament is divided. The country is divided. Theresa May has negotiated with the E.U and has come up with an agreement which is a compromise between the demands of those wanting to leave the E.U and those that wish to remain. It is an incredibly challenging role. The PM needs the support of her Cabinet, Parliament and the country.
attributes.background: Theresa May was elected by the people of the UK to be Prime Minister. She has been committed to the role in a time of extreme political turbulence.The country needs the stability of the elected Prime Minister.
